nodes.text: ED-4 was a slicer droid who was one of the three droid brains that made up the computer of the starship Millennium Falcon. The other two were known as V5-T and L3-37. Long before the Millenium Falcon was known to Lando or L3-37, the droid's consciousness was uploaded onto the Millenium Falcon to join V5-T, who had been the first to join the Falcon.
